title: Very sad horrible experience. Will not use again
text:
I have used the booking app several times to book hotels, flights, and car rentals. I always bragged about how great they were. I loved how it showed your total to pay including all taxes and fees.
 All that went out the window with the last trip I booked through booking. I booked our flight and rental car with no problems. It was our hotel booking that went terribly wrong.
 I got a message that I could upgrade the room for a small additional fee so I did so. Then I got a message that I needed to pay an additional $1100.00 or my booking would be cancelled. I called customer service right away to get things straightened out. The customer service guy reassured me that he got it back to the price I was originally told and said to ignore what the app was saying because he had it taken care of.
 To my surprise they cancelled my booking 2 days before my trip because I didn‚Äôt pay the additional thousand dollars that they were demanding. 
I was absolutely devastated!!
 In an absolute panic I frantically searched for somewhere to stay through Priceline. Ended up getting the same hotel with the upgraded room for $500 less than what I was getting the non upgraded room for through Booking. I will be deleting the app. Will not use again.

title: Make sure to pay to the site directly
text: I was happy with Booking.com for a long time until Booking.com did not make a payment to the hotel even though I made a payment to booking.com in advance. The hotel charged me the same amount because they never received a payment from booking.com. Initially, I contacted the booking.com. The customer service kept asking me for the screenshot of my bank statements even though I already provided it to them. I figured that the booking.com was not going to refund money to me. I contacted the hotel. The hotel paid money back to me after providing them the screenshot of my bank statement. From now on, I will pay money to the hotel directly not to booking.com.

title: Unscrupulous partners
text: Booking.com takes no responsibility for the shady operations or the partners they use. I booked a trip to Chile to an event that was critical, and when that trip was cancelled by the booking partner they use in India, I was out thousands of dollars and had no way to contact anyone through booking.com to get support. Beware!!
